## How to Use Custom Themes

To use a custom theme with Marp:

```bash
# Download a theme CSS file
curl -O https://rnd195.github.io/my-marp-themes/beam.css

# Build with custom theme
marp slides.md --theme beam.css -o output.pdf --pdf
```

Or add theme to frontmatter and use `--theme-set`:

```markdown
---
marp: true
theme: beam
---
```

```bash
marp slides.md --theme-set beam.css -o output.pdf --pdf
```
